00052 namespace {
00053   struct reverse_sort_clfi {
00054     bool operator()(const CommitLogFileInfo &clfi1, const CommitLogFileInfo &clfi2) const {
00055       return clfi1.num >= clfi2.num;
00056     }
00057   };
00058 }

00063 CommitLogReader::CommitLogReader(Filesystem *fs, String log_dir) : CommitLogBase(log_dir), m_fs(fs), m_block_buffer(256), m_compressor(0) {
00064   load_fragments(log_dir);
00065 }

00073 bool CommitLogReader::next_raw_block(CommitLogBlockInfo *infop, BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog *header) {
00074 
00075  try_again:
00076 
00077   if (m_fragment_stack.empty())
00078     return false;
00079 
00080   if (m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream == 0)
00081     m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream = new CommitLogBlockStream(m_fs, m_fragment_stack.top().log_dir, format("%u", m_fragment_stack.top().num));
00082 
00083   if (!m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream->next(infop, header)) {
00084     delete m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream;
00085     m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream = 0;
00086     m_fragment_stack.top().timestamp = m_last_timestamp;
00087     m_fragment_queue.push_back(m_fragment_stack.top());
00088     m_fragment_stack.pop();
00089     goto try_again;
00090   }
00091 
00092   if (header->check_magic(CommitLog::MAGIC_LINK)) {
00093     assert(header->get_compression_type() == BlockCompressionCodec::NONE);
00094     String log_dir = (const char *)(infop->block_ptr + header->length());
00095     load_fragments(log_dir);
00096     goto try_again;
00097   }
00098 
00099   return true;
00100 }

00104 bool CommitLogReader::next(const uint8_t **blockp, size_t *lenp, BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog *header) {
00105   CommitLogBlockInfo binfo;
00106 
00107   while (next_raw_block(&binfo, header)) {
00108 
00109     if (binfo.error == Error::OK) {
00110       DynamicBuffer zblock;
00111 
00112       m_block_buffer.clear();
00113       zblock.base = binfo.block_ptr;
00114       zblock.ptr = binfo.block_ptr + binfo.block_len;
00115 
00116       try {
00117         load_compressor(header->get_compression_type());
00118         m_compressor->inflate(zblock, m_block_buffer, *header);
00119       }
00120       catch (Exception &e) {
00121         HT_ERRORF("Inflate error in CommitLog fragment %s starting at "
00122                   "postion %lld (block len = %lld) - %s",
00123                   m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream->get_fname().c_str(),
00124                   binfo.start_offset, binfo.end_offset - binfo.start_offset,
00125                   Error::get_text(e.code()));
00126         continue;
00127       }
00128 
00129       m_last_timestamp = header->get_timestamp();
00130 
00131       zblock.release();
00132       *blockp = m_block_buffer.base;
00133       *lenp = m_block_buffer.fill();
00134       return true;
00135     }
00136 
00137     HT_WARNF("Corruption detected in CommitLog fragment %s starting at "
00138              "postion %lld for %lld bytes - %s",
00139              m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream->get_fname().c_str(),
00140              binfo.start_offset, binfo.end_offset - binfo.start_offset,
00141              Error::get_text(binfo.error));
00142     m_fragment_stack.pop();
00143 
00144   }
00145 
00146   return false;
00147 }

00151 void CommitLogReader::load_fragments(String &log_dir) {
00152   vector<string> listing;
00153   CommitLogFileInfo file_info;
00154   vector<CommitLogFileInfo> fragment_vector;
00155   struct reverse_sort_clfi fragment_ordering_obj;
00156 
00157   FileUtils::add_trailing_slash(log_dir);
00158 
00159   m_fs->readdir(log_dir, listing);
00160 
00161   if (listing.size() == 0)
00162     return;
00163 
00164   for (size_t i=0; i<listing.size(); i++) {
00165     char *endptr;
00166     long num = strtol(listing[i].c_str(), &endptr, 10);
00167     if (*endptr != 0) {
00168       HT_WARNF("Invalid file '%s' found in commit log directory '%s'", listing[i].c_str(), log_dir.c_str());
00169     }
00170     else {
00171       file_info.num = (uint32_t)num;
00172       file_info.log_dir = log_dir;
00173       file_info.purge_log_dir = false;
00174       file_info.timestamp = 0;
00175       file_info.block_stream = 0;
00176       file_info.size = m_fs->length(log_dir + listing[i]);
00177       if (file_info.size > 0)
00178         fragment_vector.push_back(file_info);
00179     }
00180   }
00181 
00182   if (fragment_vector.empty())
00183     return;
00184 
00185   sort(fragment_vector.begin(), fragment_vector.end(), fragment_ordering_obj);
00186 
00187   // set the "purge log dir" bit on the most recent fragment
00188   fragment_vector[0].purge_log_dir = true;
00189 
00190   for (size_t i=0; i<fragment_vector.size(); i++)
00191     m_fragment_stack.push(fragment_vector[i]);
00192 
00193 }

00195 
00196 void CommitLogReader::load_compressor(uint16_t ztype) {
00197   BlockCompressionCodecPtr compressor_ptr;
00198 
00199   if (m_compressor != 0 && ztype == m_compressor_type)
00200     return;
00201   if (ztype >= BlockCompressionCodec::COMPRESSION_TYPE_LIMIT)
00202     throw Hypertable::Exception(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_UNSUPPORTED_TYPE, (String)"Invalid compression type - " + ztype);
00203 
00204   compressor_ptr = m_compressor_map[ztype];
00205 
00206   if (!compressor_ptr) {
00207     compressor_ptr = CompressorFactory::create_block_codec((BlockCompressionCodec::Type)ztype);
00208     m_compressor_map[ztype] = compressor_ptr;
00209   }
00210 
00211   m_compressor_type = ztype;
00212   m_compressor = compressor_ptr.get();
00213 }
